column1: A blue wave crashed ashore in 2018. Democrats will have control of the U.S. House once again come January because of an uprising in the suburbs and among women and independents. They helped Democrats net 40 seats
column2: the most in any election for Democrats in a generation

column1: Democratic Control Of The House Is Trouble For Trump
Democratic Control Of The House Is Trouble For Trump
It was a remarkable accomplishment that will have massive consequences for President Trump
column2: with incoming Democratic committee chairmen preparing subpoenas and about to ramp up investigations of the Trump administration
column3: the president's businesses and perhaps even his personal finances.
